The shooting hall provides professional shooting guidance and safety guarantee to ensure that the shooting experience of tourists is safe and enjoyable. In addition, the shooting hall also provides shooting equipment rental services, and visitors can choose different equipment according to their needs. The shooting hall has a seating area and restaurant where visitors can rest, eat and enjoy the fun of shooting after shooting. In short, Seoul's Namdaemun live shooting hall is a good place to experience live shooting, whether it is shooting enthusiasts or beginners, you can find a shooting project suitable for yourself here.
